message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this amazing product to you. I've done some research and I think it's worth a lot to you, so I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $900000. This is a great deal, considering the value it holds for you. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you acknowledging the value this product holds for me. However, $900000 is a bit higher than my target price. I'm willing to offer $650000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $900000 is a bit higher than your target price, but I still think the product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $750000. This is a great compromise, considering the value it holds for you. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $750000 is closer to my target price, I'm still hoping to get a better deal. I'm prepared to offer $700000. This is a fair price considering the value we both see in the product.

I understand that you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $725000. This is the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer you the product for $725000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value it holds for you. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $725000 is still a bit higher than I can comfortably go. I'm willing to offer $710000.  I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the value we both see in the product, and it gets us closer to a deal. What do you think?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $720000. This is the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer you the product for $720000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value it holds for you. What do you think?
